subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The hotel and casino said it had no say in the construction of the Yankee Stadium sports bar that bears its name — a structure that obscures views of up to 1,048 fans.
snippet: The hotel and casino said it had no say in the construction of the Yankee Stadium sports bar that bears its name — a structure that obscures views of up to 1,048 fans.
